thread.title: MillerCoors to Shut North Carolina Brewery Amid Volume Declines
thread.title_full: MillerCoors to Shut North Carolina Brewery Amid Volume Declines - WSJ

author: Mike Esterl
title: MillerCoors to Shut North Carolina Brewery Amid Volume Declines
text:
MillerCoors LLC said Monday it will shut its brewery in Eden, N.C., next year, affecting 520 workers, as the second-largest U.S. brewer by sales grapples with falling consumption of mainstream beers.
The maker of Coors Light and Miller Lite cautioned it expects continued volume declines “each of the next few years” after its volumes contracted by 10 million barrels since 2008. It cited ”economic challenges, an explosion of choice and... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
